front.title: Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) Nonce Extension

abstract.t: This document updates the Nonce extension section of RFC-8954. Nonce extension is a optional extension for Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) request and response messages. OCSP is used for checking the status of a certificate, and the Nonce extension is used to cryptographically bind an OCSP response message to a particular OCSP request message. This document updates RFC 8954.
